answerText: "Where Are You Going, Where Have You Been?"[10] "Where Are You Going, Where Have You Been?" was written by this American author of Bellefleur and We Were the Mulvaneys. She wrote about a curse afflicting the upper classes of Princeton in her recent novel The Accursed.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 10 | 14 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The rebellious protagonist of this story sees a mysterious man in a convertible who says "Gonna get you, baby." For 10 points each: [10] Name this short story in which 15-year-old Connie is visited by Arnold Friend, who demands that she go for a ride with him.
